phrase.translation: 清除旧的自动保存数据

phrase.original: Autosave could not be fully reconstructed. Partial reconstruction attempted instead.
phrase.translation: 自动保存不能完全恢复。

phrase.original: sRGB transform could not be applied. Image remains in CMYK format.
phrase.translation: sRGB的变换不适用，图像保持为CMYK格式。

phrase.original: Both ICC profiles loaded successfully, but CMYK transformation could not be created.
phrase.translation: 成功加载两个ICC配置文件，但无法创建CMYK转换。

phrase.original: Could not obtain standard sRGB color profile. CMYK transform abandoned.
phrase.translation: 无法获得标准的sRGB色彩配置文件，取消CMYK转换。

phrase.original: Embedded ICC profile is invalid. CMYK transform could not be performed.
phrase.translation: 嵌入ICC配置文件无效，CMYK转换不能进行。

phrase.original: ICC profile could not be applied. Image remains in original profile.
phrase.translation: ICC配置文件无法应用。图像保持在原来的轮廓。

phrase.original: Both ICC profiles loaded successfully, but transformation could not be created.
phrase.translation: 成功加载两个ICC配置文件，但无法创建的转换。

phrase.original: Could not obtain standard sRGB color profile. Color management has been disabled for this image.
phrase.translation: 无法获得标准的sRGB色彩配置文件。色彩管理已被禁用这一形象。

phrase.original: Embedded ICC profile is invalid. Color management has been disabled for this image.
phrase.translation: 嵌入ICC配置文件是无效的。色彩管理已被禁用这一形象。

phrase.original: ExifTool could not be started. Metadata unavailable for this session.
phrase.translation: ExifTool无法启动。元数据不可用。

phrase.original: Please wait while the tag database is created
phrase.translation: 请稍候，正在创建标签数据库

phrase.original: The tag database handles technical details of the 20,000+ metadata tags supported by PhotoDemon. Creating the database takes 10 to 15 seconds, and it only needs to be created once, when the metadata editor is used for the first time.
phrase.translation: 标签数据库处理20000+元数据标签支持的PhotoDemon技术细节。创建数据库需要10到15秒，当元数据编辑器第一次使用时，它只需要创建一次。

phrase.original: This image does not contain any metadata.
phrase.translation: 该映像不包含任何元数据。

phrase.original: This file format does not support metadata. Metadata processing skipped.
phrase.translation: 该文件格式不支持的元数据。元数据处理跳过。

phrase.original: Failed to start plugin service (couldn't create pipe).
phrase.translation: 无法启动插件服务（无法创建管道）。

phrase.original: Failed to start plugin service (couldn't create process: %1).
phrase.translation: 无法启动插件服务（无法创建过程：%1）。

phrase.original:
Before lossless copies can be saved, you must save this image at least once.
Lossless copies will be saved to the same folder as this initial image save.
phrase.translation:
为了恢复以前丢失的副本，您必须保存此图像至少一次。
此副本将被保存到同一文件夹。

phrase.original:
The zLib compression library (zlibwapi.dll) was marked as missing or disabled upon program initialization.
To enable PDI saving, please allow %1 to download plugin updates by going to the Tools -> Options menu, and selecting the 'offer to download core plugins' check box.
phrase.translation:
zlib压缩库（zlibwapi.DLL）丢失或在程序初始化失败。
请允许 %1 下载插件更新，需要在工具 --> 选项菜单，并选择“提供下载的核心插件”复选框。
没有发现 %1 编码器，保存失败。

phrase.original:
An unspecified error occurred when attempting to save this image. Please try saving the image to an alternate format.
If the problem persists, please report it to the PhotoDemon developers via photodemon.org/contact
phrase.translation: 试图保存该图像时出现未知错误。请尝试将图像保存到一个备用格式。 如果问题仍然存在，请报告PhotoDemon开发商

phrase.original: Unfortunately, this PC does not have enough memory to create a %1x%2 image. Please reduce the requested size and try again.
phrase.translation: 没有足够的内存来创建图像 %1 x %2 ，请选择一个小点的图像大小后再试。

phrase.original: Accelerating to 88mph in order to antique-ify this image
phrase.translation: 加快88mph为了使这一形象仿古

phrase.original: Engaging hipsters to perform sepia conversion
phrase.translation: 从时尚向棕褐色进行转换

phrase.original: Putting image to sleep, then measuring its REM cycles
phrase.translation: 让图像的睡眠然后测量其REM周期

phrase.original: Counting the number of unique colors in this image
phrase.translation: 在这幅独特的颜色统计数
此图像包含%1的独特色彩。

phrase.original: Image is all one color. Autocrop unnecessary.
phrase.translation: 图片就一个颜色，无需自动裁剪。

phrase.original: Image is already cropped intelligently. Autocrop abandoned. (No changes were made to the image.)
phrase.translation: 图像已被智能裁剪。自动裁剪废弃。（没有改变图像。）

phrase.original: No active selection found. Crop abandoned.
phrase.translation: 没有活动的选择找到，放弃裁剪

phrase.original: Image is fully transparent. Trim abandoned.
phrase.translation: 图像是完全透明的，放弃修剪。

phrase.original: Image is already trimmed. (No changes were made to the image.)
phrase.translation: 图像已修剪。（没有改变图像。）

phrase.original: GDI+ failed to render blur effect (Error Code %1).
phrase.translation: GDI+无法呈现模糊效果（错误代码为%1）。

phrase.original: GDI+ failed to set effect parameters.
GDI+ failed to create blur effect object
phrase.translation: GDI+无法创建模糊效果对象

phrase.original: Preparing GDI+ encoder for this filetype
%1 save failed (FreeImage_SaveEx silent fail). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
phrase.translation: %1 保存失败（FreeImage_SaveEx 失败）。请报告此错误使用帮助->提交错误报告。

phrase.original: %1 save failed (FreeImage returned blank handle). Please report this error using Help -> Submit Bug Report.
phrase.translation: %1 保存失败（FreeImage返回空白处理）。请报告此错误使用帮助->提交错误报告。

phrase.original:
The FreeImage interface plug-in (FreeImage.dll) was marked as missing or disabled upon program initialization.
To enable support for this image format, please copy the FreeImage.dll file (downloadable from http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/download.html) into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
phrase.translation:
对FreeImage接口插件（FreeImage。DLL）被丢失或在程序初始化时错误。
为了使这种图像格式的支持，请复制FreeImage.dll文件（http://freeimage.sourceforge.net/download.html）到插件目录并重新加载程序。

phrase.original: Save cannot be completed without FreeImage library.
phrase.translation: 由于缺失 FreeImage 库，没有保存成功

phrase.original:
The PDI file "%1" contains compressed data, but the zLib plugin is missing or disabled.
To enable support for compressed PDI files, click Help > Check for Updates, and when prompted, allow PhotoDemon to download all recommended plugins.
phrase.translation:
该PDI文件 “%1” 包含压缩数据，但是zlib的插件丢失或禁用。
要启用压缩的PDI文件的支持，单击帮助>检查更新，并在提示时，允许PhotoDemon下载所有推荐的插件。

phrase.original: PDI node could not be read; file may be invalid or corrupted. Load abandoned.
phrase.translation: PDI节点无法读取;文件可能无效或已损坏，放弃打开。

phrase.original: An error has occurred (#%1 - %2). PDI load abandoned.
phrase.translation: 发生一个错误（#%1 - 2%）。 取消打开PDI

phrase.original: Selected file is not in PDI format. Load abandoned.
phrase.translation: 选择的文件不是PDI格式，取消打开。

phrase.original: GDI+ refused to load image. Dropping back to internal routines and trying again
phrase.translation: GDI+拒绝加载图像。降到内部例程并再次尝试

phrase.original: clamp them to the nearest available pixel
phrase.translation: 把它们适用到最可用像素

phrase.original: reflect them across the nearest edge
Are you sure you want to cancel %1?
This action will convert text and vector layers to image (raster) layers, meaning you can no longer modify layer-specific settings like text, font, color or shape.
phrase.translation: 这个动作将文本和矢量图层转换成图像（栅格）图层，这意味着你可以不再修改图层的特定设置，比如文字，字体，颜色或者形状。

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to continue?
Yes. Convert text and vector layers to image (raster) layers.
phrase.translation: 是。转换文本和矢量图层图像（光栅）层。

phrase.original: No. Leave text and vector layers as they are.
phrase.translation: 否，因为它们离开文本和矢量图层

phrase.original: This text layer will be changed to an image (raster) layer, meaning you can no longer modify its text or font settings.
phrase.translation: 这个文本层将被更改为一个图像（栅格）层，这意味着你可以不再修改它的文本或字体设置。

phrase.original: Yes. Please convert this text layer.
No. Leave this text layer as it is.
I can't decide. Cancel this action.
phrase.translation: 我不能确定。取消此操作。

phrase.original: In the future, automatically rasterize without prompting me
phrase.translation: 以后不自动提示我自动栅格化

phrase.original: ICC transform requested, but no data found. Abandoning attempt.
phrase.translation: ICC变换请求，但没有发现数据。放弃尝试。

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, the image '%1' could not be found.
If this image was originally located on removable media (DVD, USB drive, etc), please re-insert or re-attach the media and try again.
phrase.translation: 图像 '%1' 没有找到，如果源图像位于可移动媒体（DVD、USB驱动器等），请重新插入或重新连接媒体并再试一次。

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, the file '%1' is currently locked by another program on this PC.
Please close this file in any other running programs, then try again.
phrase.translation:
不幸的是，文件 '%1' 当前被该PC上的另一个程序锁定。
请在任何其他正在运行的程序中关闭此文件，然后重试。

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image:
%1
Please use another program to save this image in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG) before loading it. Thanks!
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon无法加载以下图像： %1 请使用另一个程序在一个通用的格式保存该图像（如JPEG或PNG）前加载。谢谢!

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image:
%1
Please use another program to save this image in a generic format (such as JPEG or PNG) before loading it into PhotoDemon. Thanks!
phrase.translation: 无法加载以下图像： %1 请先使用其他程序转换为一个通用的图像格式（如JPEG、PNG）再用PhotodeMon打开。谢谢！

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, PhotoDemon was unable to load the following image(s):
%1 Please verify that these image(s) exist, and that they use a supported image format (like JPEG or PNG). Thanks!
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon无法加载下面的图像： %1 请验证这些图像是否存在，以及是否使用支持的图像格式（如JPEG或PNG）。 谢谢！

phrase.original:
This macro does not contain any recordable actions. Are you sure you want to stop recording?
(Press No to continue recording.)
phrase.translation:
该宏不包含任何可记录的动作。要停止记录吗？
（按否继续录音。）

phrase.original:
If you do not save this macro, all actions recorded during this session will be permanently lost. Are you sure you want to cancel?
(Press No to return to the Save Macro screen. Note that you can always delete this macro later if you decide you don't want it.)
phrase.translation: 如果您没有保存该宏，所有的行动，在这个会议记录将永久丢失。您确定要取消吗？ （按“取消”返回到保存宏屏幕。请注意，您可以删除这个宏以后如果你决定你不想要它。）

phrase.original: Warning: last chance to save macro
Incompatible macro version found. Macro playback abandoned.
phrase.translation: 不兼容的宏版本，宏回放放弃。

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, this macro file is no longer supported by the current version of PhotoDemon.
In version 6.0, PhotoDemon macro files were redesigned to support new features, improve performance, and solve some long-standing reliability issues. Unfortunately, this means that macros recorded prior to version 6.0 are no longer compatible. You will need to re-record these macros from scratch.
(Note that any old macro files will still work in old versions of PhotoDemon, if you absolutely need to access them.)
phrase.translation:
该宏文件不再被PhotoDemon的当前版本支持。
在6.0版本中，PhotoDemon宏文件进行了重新设计，以支持新的功能，提高性能，并解决了一些长期存在的可靠性问题。这意味着之前的版本6.0宏不再兼容。您将需要重新记录这些宏。
（请注意，任何旧的宏文件仍然可以工作在旧版本PhotoDemon的，如果你确实需要访问它们。）

phrase.original:
The selected scanner or digital camera isn't responding.
Please make sure the device is turned on and ready for use.
phrase.translation:
所选择的扫描仪或数码相机没有响应。
请确保该设备已打开并准备使用。

phrase.original:
The scanner/digital camera interface plug-in (EZTW32.dll) was marked as missing upon program initialization.
To enable scanner support, please copy the EZTW32.dll file (available for download from http://eztwain.com/ezt1_download.htm) into the plug-in directory and reload the program.
phrase.translation:
扫描仪/数码相机接口插件（EZTW32.dll）标记为在程序初始化时失踪。
为了使扫描仪的支持，请在EZTW32.dll文件（可从http://eztwain.com/ezt1_download.htm下载）复制到插件目录并重新加载该程序。

phrase.original: Unknown error occurred. Please make sure your scanner is turned on and ready for use.
phrase.translation: 发生未知错误。请确保您的扫描仪已打开并准备使用。

phrase.original: Scan successful, but temporary file save failed. Is it possible that your hard drive is full (or almost full)?
phrase.translation: 扫描成功！但保存临时文件失败。请检测您的硬盘驱动器是否已满。

phrase.original: Unable to acquire DIB lock. Please make sure no other programs are accessing the scanner. If the problem persists, reboot and try again.
phrase.translation: 无法获得DIB锁，请确保没有其他程序访问扫描仪，如果问题仍然存在，重新启动并再试一次。

phrase.original: Temporary file access error. This can be caused when running on a system with limited access rights. Please enable admin rights and try again.
phrase.translation: 临时文件访问错误。这可能是因为用户的访问权限引起的。请启用管理员权限，然后再试一次。

phrase.original: Scan canceled at the user's request.
The scanner returned an error code that wasn't specified in the EZTW32.dll documentation (Error #%1). Please visit http://www.eztwain.com for more information.
phrase.translation: 扫描仪返回一个错误代码，不在eztw32.dll文件规定（错误号 # % 1）。更多信息请访问http://www.eztwain.com。

phrase.original: Multipage image found. Loading page #%1 of %2
phrase.translation: 发现多页图像。开始加载页面 #%1 of %2

phrase.original: Using OptiPNG to optimize the PNG file. This may take a moment
phrase.translation: 通过使用OptiPNG优化PNG文件。这可能需要一些时间

phrase.original: Using pngquant to optimize the PNG file. This may take a moment
phrase.translation: 使用pngquant优化PNG文件。这可能需要一些时间

phrase.original: PNGQuant could not write file. Default 32bpp image was saved instead.
phrase.translation: pngquant无法写入文件，默认32bpp图像已经保存。

phrase.original: Image successfully sent to Windows Photo Printer.
phrase.translation: 图片成功发送到Windows照片打印机。

phrase.original:
Unknown processor request submitted: %1
Please report this bug via the Help -> Submit Bug Report menu.
phrase.translation:
提交未知的处理器的要求：1％
请报告通过帮助这个bug - >提交错误报告菜单。

phrase.original: There is not enough memory available to continue this operation. Please free up system memory (RAM) by shutting down unneeded programs - especially your web browser, if it is open - then try the action again.
phrase.translation: 没有足够的可用内存来继续此操作。请释放系统内存（RAM），通过关闭不需要的程序 - 尤其是你的网页浏览器，如果是公开 - 然后再次尝试此操作。

phrase.original: The specified file could not be located. If it was located on removable media, please re-insert the proper floppy disk, CD, or portable drive. If the file is not located on portable media, make sure that: 1) the file hasn't been deleted, and... 2) the file location provided to PhotoDemon is correct.
phrase.translation: 指定的文件找不到。如果它位于可移动媒体上，请重新插入正确的软盘，光盘或移动硬盘。如果该文件不位于便携式媒体，请确保： 1）该文件没有被删除，... 2）提供给PhotoDemon文件位置是否正确。

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon cannot locate additional information for this error. That probably means this error is a bug, and it needs to be fixed!
Would you like to submit a bug report? (It takes less than one minute, and it helps everyone who uses the software.)
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon找不到更多信息此错误。这可能意味着这个错误是一个错误，它需要修复！
你想提交错误报告？ （整个过程不到一分钟，它可以帮助大家谁使用该软件。）

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has experienced an error. Details on the problem include:
Error number %1 Description: %2
%3
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon出现错误。对这个问题的详细信息包括：
错误号％1 说明：2％
3％

phrase.original:
Thank you for submitting a bug report. To make sure your bug is addressed as quickly as possible, PhotoDemon needs you to answer one more question.
Do you have a GitHub account? (If you have no idea what this means, answer "No".)
phrase.translation:
感谢您提交的bug报告。为确保您的错误是尽可能快地解决，PhotoDemon需要你回答一个问题。
你有一个GitHub的帐户？ （如果你不知道这是什么意思，回答“否”。）

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has automatically opened a GitHub bug report webpage for you. In the Title box, please enter the following error number with a short description of the problem: %1
Any additional details you can provide in the large text box, including the steps that led up to this error, will help it get fixed as quickly as possible.
When finished, click the Submit New Issue button. Thank you!
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon已经自动开通了GitHub上的错误报告的网页给你。在标题框中，请输入以下故障代码问题的简短描述：1％
任何额外的细节，你可以在大的文本框，其中包括导致了这个错误的步骤提供，将有助于它得到尽快解决。
完成后，点击提交新问题按钮。谢谢！

phrase.original:
PhotoDemon has automatically opened a bug report webpage for you. In the Comment box, please describe the steps that led to this error.
Also in that box, please include the following error number: %1
When finished, click the Submit button. Thank you!
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon已经自动打开了一个bug报告网页给你。在注释框中，请说明导致这一错误的步骤。
此外，在该框，请提供下列错误：％1
完成后，点击提交按钮。谢谢！

phrase.original:
An error occurred when attempting to save this image. The FreeImage plugin reported the following error details:
%1
In the meantime, please try saving the image to an alternate format. You can also let the PhotoDemon developers know about this via the Help > Submit Bug Report menu.
phrase.translation:
试图保存该图像时发生错误。该插件FreeImage的报告了以下错误信息：
1％
在此期间，请尽量将图像保存到一个备用格式。您也可以通过帮助>提交错误报告菜单让开发商 PhotoDemon 知道这个。

phrase.original: Output format not recognized. Save aborted. Please use the Help -> Submit Bug Report menu item to report this incident.
phrase.translation: 输出格式无法识别。保存失败。请使用帮助->提交错误报告菜单项报告这一事件。

phrase.original: Could not retrieve program window - the program appears to have been unloaded.
phrase.translation: 无法检索程序窗口 - 该计划似乎已被卸载。

phrase.original: An error occurred while attempting to load %1. Please verify that the file is a valid PhotoDemon selection file.
phrase.translation: 打开%1时发生错误。请验证该文件是否是有效PhotoDemon文件。

phrase.original: Unknown error occurred. Selection was not saved. Please try again.
phrase.translation: 未知错误，选择没有保存，请重试。

phrase.original: This action requires an active selection. Please create a selection before continuing.
phrase.translation: 此操作需要一个活动的选择。继续之前，请创建一个选择。

phrase.original: Release the mouse button to complete the lasso selection
phrase.translation: 松开鼠标按钮来完成套索选择

phrase.original: Click on the first point to complete the polygon selection
phrase.translation: 点击第一个点完成多边形选择

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a value between %2 and %3.
phrase.translation: %1不是一个有效的值。 请输入%2~%3之间的值。

phrase.original: %1 is not a valid entry. Please enter a numeric value.
phrase.translation: %1 值无效，请输入一个数字。

phrase.original: Update check postponed (a check has been performed recently)
phrase.translation: 更新检查推迟（最近已进行的检查）

phrase.original: Initializing software updater (this feature can be disabled from the Tools -> Options menu)
phrase.translation: 启动时检测软件更新（此功能可以从工具-->选项菜单禁用）

phrase.original: WARNING! GDI+ could not be found. (PhotoDemon requires GDI+ for proper program operation.)
phrase.translation: 警告！GDI+无法找到。（PhotoDemon需要 GDI+ 执行程序操作。）

phrase.original: There is not enough memory available to continue this operation. Please free up system memory (RAM) and try again. If the problem persists, reduce the zoom value and try again.
phrase.translation: 没有足够的可用内存来继续此操作。请释放系统内存（RAM），然后再试一次。如果问题仍然存在，降低缩放值，然后再试一次。

phrase.original: Viewport rendering paused due to unexpected error (#%1)
phrase.translation: 渲染暂停由于意外的错误（# % 1）

phrase.original: The clipboard is empty or it does not contain a valid picture format. Please copy a valid image onto the clipboard and try again.
phrase.translation: 剪贴板是空的或不包含一个有效的图片格式。请复制一个有效图像到剪贴板并再试一次。
剪贴板中的图像导入成功

phrase.original: Image URL found. Attempting to download
phrase.translation: 找到图片网址。尝试下载

phrase.original: Image download failed. Please copy a valid image URL and try again.
phrase.translation: 图片下载失败。请复制一个有效的图像的网址，并再次尝试。

phrase.original: Failed to load embedded image; invalid header found.
phrase.translation: 无法加载嵌入图像;无效的标头中找到。

phrase.original: ExifTool plugin missing. Metadata import abandoned.
phrase.translation: ExifTool插件缺失。元数据导入放弃。

phrase.original: Removing metadata with potential privacy concerns
phrase.translation: 因为潜在的隐私问题，删除元数据

phrase.original: Metadata may not have been embedded (but saved image still written successfully).
phrase.translation: 元数据可能没有被嵌入（但保存的图像仍然成功写入）。

phrase.original: Unfortunately, the number of images you selected exceeds what Windows® allows for a single load operation. Please try again with a smaller set of selected images.
phrase.translation: 选择的图像数量超出Windows允许的最大数，请重新选择。

phrase.original: File doesn't have valid pdPackage header. Abandoning load.
phrase.translation: 文件没有有效的pdPackage头。放弃加载。

phrase.original: File doesn't match requested sub-type value. Abandoning load.
phrase.translation: 文件不符合要求的子类型值。放弃加载。

phrase.original: Legacy file format could not be decoded.
phrase.translation: 无法解码遗留文件格式。

phrase.original: Node struct size in header is invalid. This file looks to be corrupt! Abandoning load.
phrase.translation: 节点结构尺寸的标头无效。文件已经损坏！

phrase.original: WARNING! Decompressed directory chunk size shows possible CRC error (
phrase.translation: 警告！解压后的目录块的大小显示了可能的CRC错误（

phrase.original: Directory is compressed, but zLib failed to decompress it. Error code returned: %1
phrase.translation: 目录被压缩，但zlib解压缩失败了。错误代码返回：% 1

phrase.original: Directory chunk is compressed, but zLib is missing. Decompression impossible; abandoning load.
phrase.translation: 目录块被压缩，但zlib的丢失。解压失败，取消打开。

phrase.original: Data chunk is compressed, but zLib failed to decompress it. Error code returned: %1
phrase.translation: 数据块被压缩，但ZLIB未能解压缩。返回错误代码：%1

phrase.original: Data chunk is compressed, but zLib is missing. Decompression impossible; abandoning load.
phrase.translation: 数据块被压缩，但zlib的丢失，无法解压，放弃打开。

phrase.original: File node is compressed, but zLib failed to decompress it. Error code returned: %1
phrase.translation: 文件节点被压缩，但ZLIB未能解压缩。返回错误代码：%1

phrase.original: File node is compressed, but zLib is missing. Decompression impossible; abandoning load.
phrase.translation: 文件被压缩，但zlib的缺失。不能解压缩，取消打开

phrase.original: File node is uncompressed, but size is listed as zero. Load impossible; abandoning attempt.
phrase.translation: 文件节点未压缩，但大小被列为零。放弃加载。

phrase.original: Shift key: preserve layer aspect ratio
Mouse Wheel = VERTICAL SCROLL, Shift + Wheel = HORIZONTAL SCROLL, Ctrl + Wheel = ZOOM
phrase.translation: 鼠标滚轮=垂直滚动，Shift键+滚轮=水平滚动，按Ctrl+滚轮=放大

phrase.original: Center the image inside the viewport

Drag an image onto this space to begin editing.
You can also use the Open Image button on the left, or the File > Open and File > Import menus.
phrase.translation: 拖动图片到这个位置开始编辑； 你也可以使用左边的黄色打开按钮打开图像； 或文件>打开… 菜单 和 文件>导入 菜单来打开图像。

phrase.original: Click to enter a full color selection screen.
phrase.translation: 点击进入全彩色选择屏幕。

phrase.original: Click to make the main screen's paint color the active color.
phrase.translation: 点击使主屏的油漆颜色成为当前颜色。

phrase.original: Apply this action to the current image.
phrase.translation: 套用这个动作对当前图像。

phrase.original: Exit this tool. No changes will be made to the image.
phrase.translation: 离开这个工具，未更改图像。

phrase.original: Reset all settings to their default values.
phrase.translation: 重置所有设置为默认值。

phrase.original: Randomly select new settings for this tool. This is helpful for exploring how different settings affect the image.
phrase.translation: 随机选择该工具的新的设置。这有助于探索如何不同的设置会影响图像。

phrase.original: Save the current settings as a new preset.
phrase.translation: 保存当前设置新的预置。

phrase.original: Previously saved presets can be selected here. You can save the current settings as a new preset by clicking the Save Preset button on the right.
phrase.translation: 以前保存的预设可以选择在这里。你可以保存当前设置为一个新的预设通过单击“保存预设右边的按钮。

phrase.original: Once this image has been saved to disk, its filename will appear here.
phrase.translation: 一旦这个图像保存到磁盘，它的文件名就会出现在这里。

phrase.original: This image does not have a filename.
Hover an image thumbnail to see its name and current file location.
phrase.translation: 一个图像的缩略图，看看它的名称和当前文件位置。

phrase.original: copy all relevant metadata to the new file
phrase.translation: 所有相关的元数据复制到新的文件

phrase.original: erase tags that might be personal (including GPS and location)
phrase.translation: 清除可能是个人的标签（包括全球定位系统和位置）

phrase.original: This image does not contain metadata.
The final width and height measurements must be between 1 and 32760 pixels.
phrase.translation: 最终的宽度和高度必须在1和32760像素之间。

phrase.original: Preserve aspect ratio (sometimes called Constrain Proportions). Use this option to resize an image while keeping the width and height in sync.
phrase.translation: 保持纵横比（有时也称为约束比例）。使用此选项来调整图像的大小，同时保持同步的宽度和高度。

phrase.original: Change the unit of measurement used to resize the image.
phrase.translation: 更改测量用来调整图像大小的单位。

phrase.original: Change the unit of measurement used for image resolution (pixel density).
phrase.translation: 改变用于图像分辨率（像素密度）的测量单位。

phrase.original: exact aspect ratio will vary by image
phrase.translation: 将不同的图像精确纵横比

phrase.original: exact size will vary by image
phrase.translation: 精确大小会因图像而异

phrase.original: Change the image size unit displayed to the left of this box
phrase.translation: 将图像大小单位显示为左边框的值

phrase.original: Select which scanner or camera to use
phrase.translation: 选择要使用的扫描仪或照相机

phrase.original: Show when multiple images are loaded
Support us with a small donation (thank you!)
phrase.translation: 支持我们一个小的捐赠（谢谢！）

phrase.original: Read license and terms of use
phrase.translation: 阅读许可证和使用条款

phrase.original: A new version of PhotoDemon is available. The update is automatically processing in the background
phrase.translation: 发现 PhotoDemon 新版本。此更新在后台自动处理

phrase.original: This copy of PhotoDemon is up to date.

A new version of PhotoDemon is available!
The update is automatically processing in the background. You will receive a new notification when it completes.
phrase.translation:
PhotoDemon 新版本可用！
此更新将在后台自动处理。它完成时，您将收到新的通知。

phrase.original:
This copy of PhotoDemon is the newest version available.
(Current version: %1.%2.%3)
phrase.translation: 当前 PhotodeMon 是最新的版本,无须更新。 （当前版本：%1.%2.%3）

phrase.original: Asynchronous metadata check complete! Updating metadata collection
phrase.translation: 异步元数据检查完成！更新元数据收集
自动正确的阴影和高光

phrase.original:
Thank you for submitting a bug report. To make sure your bug is addressed as quickly as possible, PhotoDemon needs to know where to send it.
Do you have a GitHub account? (If you have no idea what this means, answer "No".)
phrase.translation: 感谢您提交一个Bug报告。确保你的错误是解决尽快，Photodemon需要知道向何处发送。 你有一个GitHub的帐户吗？（如果你不知道这意味着什么，回答“不”。）

phrase.original: Please wait while the new language is applied
This image does not contain any GPS metadata.
phrase.translation: 此图像不包含任何GPS元数据。
导出选择区域为一个图像
导出选择遮罩为一个图像

phrase.original: sample image for true contrast (slower but more accurate)
phrase.translation: 真正的对比样本图像（速度较慢，但更准确）

phrase.original: Converting image to black and white
Adjusting hue, saturation, and luminance values
phrase.translation: 调节色调，饱和度和亮度值

phrase.original: color to replace (right-click preview to select)
phrase.translation: 颜色替换（右键预览选择）

phrase.original: left-click to add new nodes or drag existing nodes
phrase.translation: 左键单击以添加新节点或拖动现有节点

phrase.original: (Note: move the mouse over the histogram to calculate these values)
phrase.translation: （注：移动鼠标到直方图计算这些值）

phrase.original: Please wait while the histogram is updated
Analyzing image histogram for maximum and minimum values
phrase.translation: 判断图像直方图的最大值和最小值

phrase.original: When this button is active, you can set the shadow input level color by right-clicking a color in the preview window.
phrase.translation: 当这个按钮是活动的时候，你可以通过右键单击“预览”窗口中的颜色来设置“影子输入级”颜色。

phrase.original: When this button is active, you can set the highlight input level color by right-clicking a color in the preview window.
phrase.translation: 当这个按钮是活动的时候，你可以在预览窗口中设置一个颜色，通过右键来设置高亮的输入级别。

phrase.original: Like all monochrome-to-grayscale tools, this tool will produce a blurry image. You can use the Effects -> Sharpen -> Unsharp Masking tool to fix this. (For best results, use an Unsharp Mask radius at least as large as this radius.)
phrase.translation: 像所有的单色到灰度的工具，这个工具会产生一个模糊的图像。你可以使用效果->锐化->反锐化掩模的工具来解决这个。（最好的结果是，使用锐化掩模半径至少为这个半径大）
减少风景摄影中的阴霾

phrase.original: absorb excessive sky blue, make sky darker in black/white photos
phrase.translation: 摄取过量天蓝，使黑/白照片的天空更暗

phrase.original: absorb excessive sky blue, emphasizing clouds
high blue absorption; correction for sky, cloud, and foliage
phrase.translation: 高蓝吸收；天空，云和树叶的修正

phrase.original: moderate contrast in black/white outdoor photography
phrase.translation: 适度的对比度黑/白户外摄影

phrase.original: minus blue; reduce haze in aerial photos
darken sky in black/white outdoor photography
phrase.translation: 变暗的天空黑/白户外摄影

phrase.original: contrast filter for blue and blue-green absorption
phrase.translation: 蓝色和蓝绿色吸收的对比过滤器

phrase.original: contrast effects, darken sky and water
phrase.translation: 对比效果，变暗的天空和水

phrase.original: red for two-color photography (daylight or tungsten)
tricolor red; contrast effects in outdoor scenes
phrase.translation: 三色红；在室外场景的对比效果

phrase.original: stereo red; cuts haze, useful for storm or moonlight settings
phrase.translation: 立体红色；减少烟雾，用于的风暴或月光设置

phrase.original: color separation; extreme sky darkening in black/white photos
phrase.translation: 色分离；在黑白照片极端天空变暗

phrase.original: red absorption; useful for contrast in microscopy
phrase.translation: 红色的吸收;在显微镜对比有用
减去红色，双色的一般观察

phrase.original: direct color separation; contrast effects in commercial photography
phrase.translation: 直接颜色分离；商业摄影对比效应

phrase.original: enhance blue and purple objects; useful for fluorescent dyes
phrase.translation: 增强蓝色和紫色的对象;用于荧光颜料物体

phrase.original: color separation; calibration using SMPTE color bars
used for color separation; improves definition of foliage
phrase.translation: 用于颜色分离；改进了树叶的定义

phrase.original: used for color separation, tungsten tricolor projection
phrase.translation: 用于颜色分离，钨三色投影
红外摄影长通滤光片阻挡

phrase.original: cooling filter, 3200K to 5500K; converts indoor lighting to sunlight
phrase.translation: 冷却后过滤，3200K到5500K;转换室内照明在阳光下

phrase.original: warming filter (lowers color temperature), 3400 K to 3200 K
phrase.translation: 增温器（降低色温度），3400度至3200度

phrase.original: warming filter, 5500K to 3400K; converts sunlight to incandescent
phrase.translation: 增温滤镜、5500K到3400K；太阳光转换为白炽灯

phrase.original: remove color before photographing; rarely used for actual photos
phrase.translation: 拍摄前的颜色，很少用于实际的照片

phrase.original: neutral density filter; equally blocks all light frequencies
phrase.translation: 中性密度滤光片;全部阻止所有光频率

phrase.original: Searching image for potential red-eye locations
phrase.translation: 寻找潜在的红眼睛位置的图像
调整阴影，中间调，和亮点

phrase.original: Autosave data found. Would you like to restore it?
phrase.translation: 发现自动保存数据。你想恢复它吗？

phrase.original: A previous PhotoDemon session terminated unexpectedly. Would you like to automatically recover the following autosaved images?
phrase.translation: 先前PhotoDemon会话意外终止。你想自动恢复下自动保存的图像？

phrase.original: If you exit now, this autosave data will be lost forever. Are you sure you want to exit?
phrase.translation: 如果现在退出，此自动保存数据将永远丢失。 你确定要离开？

phrase.original: Warning: autosave data will be deleted
phrase.translation: 警告：自动保存数据将被删除

phrase.original: enter a name for this preset
phrase.translation: 为此预设输入一个名字

phrase.original: A preset with this name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
phrase.translation: 此名称的预设已经存在，你想覆盖它吗？

phrase.original: Please enter a name for this preset.
phrase.translation: 请为这个预设输入一个名称。

phrase.original: Left-click to add new nodes or edit existing nodes. Right-click a node to remove it.
phrase.translation: 左键单击要添加新节点或编辑现有节点。右键单击一个节点，将其删除。
检测到现在是 Visual Basic IDE

phrase.original: I understand the risks of running PhotoDemon in the IDE
phrase.translation: 我明白在IDE中运行photodemon有风险

phrase.original: Do not display this warning again
You are running PhotoDemon inside the Visual Basic IDE. This is not recommended.
phrase.translation: 您在Visual Basic IDE中运行PhotoDemon,这是不推荐的。

phrase.original: Please compile PhotoDemon before using it. Many features that rely on subclassing are disabled in the IDE, but some - such as custom command buttons - cannot be disabled without severely impacting the program's functionality. As such, you may experience IDE instability and crashes, especially if you close the program using the IDE's Stop button.
phrase.translation: 使用前请先编译PhotoDemon。依赖于子类的许多功能都在IDE中禁止，但一些 - 如自定义命令按钮 - 不能没有严重影响程序的功能被禁用。因此，您可能会遇到的IDE不稳定和崩溃，尤其是如果您关闭使用IDE的停止按钮的程序。

phrase.original: Additionally, like all other photo editors, PhotoDemon relies heavily on multidimensional arrays. Array performance is severely degraded in the IDE, so some functions may perform very slowly.
phrase.translation: 此外，像所有其他的照片编辑器，PhotoDemon在很大程度上依赖于多维数组。阵列的性能是在IDE严重退化，因此有些功能可能会执行得非常缓慢。

phrase.original: If you insist on running PhotoDemon in the IDE, please do not submit bugs regarding IDE crashes or freezes. PhotoDemon's developers can only address issues and bugs that affect the compiled .exe.
phrase.translation: 如果你坚持在IDE中运行PhotoDemon，请不要将有关IDE崩溃或不响应的bug提交。 PhotoDemon的开发商只能解决已经编译的程序问题和错误。

phrase.original: in the future, automatically apply these settings
phrase.translation: 以后会自动应用这些设置

phrase.original: This image contains more than 16 million colors. Before it can be displayed on your screen, it must be converted to a simpler format. This process is called tone mapping.
phrase.translation: 这张图片包含超过1600万种颜色。在你的屏幕上显示之前，它必须被转换为一个更简单的格式。这个过程称为色调映射。

phrase.original: Save the image before closing it
Repeat this action for all unsaved images (X in total)
phrase.translation: 应用到所有要保存的图像

phrase.original: Do not save the image (discard all changes)

phrase.translation: 取消关闭,返回并继续编辑

phrase.original:
NOTE: if you click 'Save', PhotoDemon will save this image using its current file name.
If you want to save it with a different file name, please select 'Cancel', then use the File -> Save As menu item.
phrase.translation:
注意：如果你点击“保存”，Photodemon将使用其当前文件名保存该图像。
如果你想用一个不同的文件名，请选择“取消”，然后使用文件->另存为”菜单项。

phrase.original: Because this image has not been saved before, you will be prompted to provide a file name for it.
phrase.translation: 如果这个图像之前没有保存，系统会提示您为它提供一个文件名。

phrase.original: If you do not save this image, any changes you have made will be permanently lost.
phrase.translation: 如果你不保存该图像，你所做的任何更改都将丢失。

phrase.original: Canceling will return you to the main PhotoDemon window.
phrase.translation: 取消关闭并返回 Photodemon 主窗口。

phrase.original: %1 has unsaved changes. What would you like to do?
phrase.translation: %1 已改变，选择你想执行的操作。

phrase.original: Repeat this action for both unsaved images
phrase.translation: 应用到所有要保存的图像

phrase.original: Repeat this action for all unsaved images (%1 in total)
phrase.translation: 应用到所有要保存的图像（共 %1）

phrase.original: in the future, do not notify me of updates
phrase.translation: 在未来，不更新时通知我

phrase.original: Learn more about the new features in %1
phrase.translation: 了解更多有关新功能在 %1

phrase.original: (Sorry, but automatic restarts don't work inside the IDE.)
phrase.translation: （很抱歉，但自动重启不能在 IDE 内部工作。）

phrase.original: A new version of PhotoDemon is available. Restart the program to complete the update process.
phrase.translation: 发现 PhotoDemon 新版本。重新启动程序以完成更新过程。

phrase.original: Restart now to access to the latest version of the program.
phrase.translation: 现在重新启动进入到程序的最新版本。

phrase.original: If you're in the middle of something, feel free to keep working. The update process will automatically complete whenever you next use the program.
phrase.translation: 如果你正在编辑图像,你可以继续工作。更新过程将自动完成，只要你下一次打开程序。

phrase.original: if pixels lie outside the image
phrase.translation: 如果像素位于图像之外

phrase.original: Note: you can also set a center position by clicking the preview window.
phrase.translation: 注意：您还可以设置一个中心位置通过单击预览窗口。

phrase.original: Peering at image through imaginary kaleidoscope
phrase.translation: 盯着图像通过想象的万花筒
使用图像颜料重绘图像
色调分离的图像（使用高级抖动）

phrase.original: Merging luminance and chroma into final image
phrase.translation: 合并的亮度和色度成最终图像

phrase.original: Analyzing image in preparation for surface blur
phrase.translation: 在准备表面模糊分析图像

phrase.original: if pixels lie outside the corrected area
phrase.translation: 如果像素位于校正区域之外

phrase.original: you can also set a center position by clicking the preview window
phrase.translation: 您还可以通过单击预览窗口设置中心位置

phrase.original: Dipping image in virtual wave pool
phrase.translation: 虚拟波池中的浸渍图像
应用的%2 合格%1 %3过滤器

phrase.original: Tracing image edges with virtual paintbrush
phrase.translation: 跟踪图像与虚拟的画笔边缘

phrase.original: Searching each pixel range for edges
phrase.translation: 搜索边缘的每个像素范围
与假想的背光照明图像

phrase.original: Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow
phrase.translation: 让它下雪，下雪吧，下雪吧

phrase.original: Bilateral filtering is a complex task, and on large images it can take a very long time to process. PhotoDemon can estimate certain parameters, providing a large speed boost at the cost of slightly lower quality.
phrase.translation: 双边滤波是一项复杂的任务，并在大型图像可能需要很长的时间来处理。 PhotoDemon可以估算某些参数，以质量稍差的成本提供了大量的速度提升。
应用侵蚀（最低等级）过滤器
应用扩张（最高等级）过滤器

phrase.original: Printing image to digital halftone surface
phrase.translation: 打印图像数码网目调面
将新调色板应用于图像

phrase.original: Applying petroleum jelly to camera lens
Applying pan and zoom (Ken Burns) effect
phrase.translation: 应用平移和缩放（肯·伯恩斯）效果
转发（轮廓定义目标区域）

phrase.original: If you want to enlarge the canvas to fit the rotated image, please use the Image -> Rotate menu instead.
phrase.translation: 如果你想扩大画布以适应旋转的图像，请使用图像>旋转菜单。

phrase.original: click OK to begin the repair operation
phrase.translation: 点击确定开始修复操作

phrase.original: attempt to repair video and audio files
overwrite matching filenames in the destination folder
phrase.translation: 覆盖目标文件夹重名文件

phrase.original: after a successful recovery, erase the original (unrepaired) file
phrase.translation: 修复成功后，删除原始(未修复)文件

phrase.original: generating list of files to repair

phrase.translation: 正在修复文件 %1 / %2 (%3 执行修复)
维修完成，修复 %1 个文件。

phrase.original:
%1 files(s) repaired.
Repaired files have been saved to the destination folder. Unrepaired files remain in their original locations.
phrase.translation: %1 个文件修复成功， 已修复的文件已保存到目标文件夹中，未修复的文件保留在其原始位置。

phrase.original: The source folder does not contain any files. Please try another folder.
phrase.translation: 源文件夹不包含任何文件，请换另一个文件夹试试。

phrase.original: Step 1: select the photo editing action(s) to apply to each image
phrase.translation: 第一步：选择适用于每个图像的编辑操作

phrase.original: set export settings for this format
phrase.translation: 设置此格式的导出设置

phrase.original: keep images in their original format
convert all images to a new format
phrase.translation: 所有的图像转换为新的格式

phrase.original: if you only want to rename images or change image formats, use this option
phrase.translation: 如果你只是想重命名或改变图像格式，请使用此选项。

phrase.original: apply other actions from a saved macro file
phrase.translation: 从保存的宏文件中应用其他操作
修正曝光和照明的问题

phrase.original: remove all images in this folder
phrase.translation: 删除此文件夹中的所有图像

phrase.original: (batch conversion process will appear here at run-time)
phrase.translation: （批量转换过程中运行时会出现在这里）

phrase.original: add a prefix to each filename
phrase.translation: 为每个文件名添加一个前缀

phrase.original: add a suffix to each filename
phrase.translation: 为每个文件名添加后缀

phrase.original: remove the following text (if found) from each filename
phrase.translation: 从每个文件名中删除以下文本（如果找到）

phrase.original: force each filename, including extension, to the following case
phrase.translation: 强制每个文件名，包括扩展名，以下情况

phrase.original: replace spaces in filenames with underscores
phrase.translation: 在文件名用下划线代替空格

phrase.original: after images are processed, save them with the following name
phrase.translation: 图像处理后，将它们保存具有以下名称
输出图像到这个文件夹

phrase.original: Are you sure you want to cancel the current batch process?
phrase.translation: 你确定你想取消当前批处理？

phrase.original:
If you exit now, your batch list (the list of images to be processed) will be lost. By saving your list, you can easily resume this batch operation at a later date.
Would you like to save your batch list before exiting?
phrase.translation: 如果你现在退出，你批处理列表（图像处理列表）将丢失。节省您的列表，你可以很容易地恢复这一批操作在稍后的日期。 您要在退出前保存您的批名单吗？

phrase.original: You have already created a list of images for processing. The list of images inside this file will be appended to the bottom of your current list.
phrase.translation: 您已经创建了一个图像处理列表，这个文件的图像列表将被附加到当前列表的底部。

phrase.original: This is not a valid list of images. Please try a different file.
phrase.translation: 这不是有效的图像列表，请尝试一个不同的文件。

phrase.original: You have requested that a macro be applied to each image, but no macro file has been selected. Please select a valid macro file.
phrase.translation: 你已经要求宏被应用到每个图像，但没有宏文件已被选定。请选择一个有效的宏文件。

phrase.original: You have not selected any images to process! Please add one or more images to the batch list.
phrase.translation: 您没有选择任何图像处理！请将一个或多个图像添加到批处理列表中。

phrase.original: Before proceeding, you need to click the "set export settings for this format" button to specify what export settings you want to use.
phrase.translation: 在继续之前，您需要单击“设置此格式的导出设置”按钮以指定要使用的导出设置。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon cannot access the requested output folder. Please select a non-system, unrestricted folder for the batch process.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon不能访问所请求的输出文件夹。请选择一个非系统的，无限制的文件夹进行批处理。

phrase.original: Welcome to PhotoDemon's batch wizard. This tool can be used to edit multiple images at once, in what is called a "batch process".
phrase.translation: 欢迎 PhotoDemon 批处理向导。这个工具可以用来同时编辑多个图像，这就是所谓的“批处理”。

phrase.original: Start by selecting the photo editing action(s) you want to apply. If multiple actions are selected, they will be applied in the order they appear on this page.
phrase.translation: 首先选择要应用的图片。如果有多个动作被选择，将会按顺序来处理。

phrase.original: Note: a "macro" is simply a list of photo editing actions. It can include any adjustment, filter, or effect in the main program. You can create a new macro by using the "Tools -> Macros -> Record new macro" menu in the main PhotoDemon window.
phrase.translation: 注：“宏”是一个简单的照片编辑动作列表。它可以包括任何调整，滤波效果，或在主程序。你可以通过“工具→宏→录制新宏”菜单创建一个新的宏。

phrase.original: In the next step, you will select the images you want to process.
phrase.translation: 在接下来的步骤中，您将选择您要处理的图片。

phrase.original: Step 2: prepare the batch list (the list of images to be processed)
phrase.translation: 第二步：准备批处理图像列表。

phrase.original: You can add files to the batch list in two ways
phrase.translation: 您可以通过两种方式将文件添加到列表

phrase.original: 1) By manually adding one or more image file(s) using a standard Open Image dialog.
phrase.translation: 1）通过图像对话框手动添加一个或多个图像文件。

phrase.original: 2) By adding entire folders at once. Image file(s) inside the folder (or subfolders, if selected) will be automatically identified.
In the next step, you will choose how you want the processed images saved.
phrase.translation: 在接下来的步骤中，您将选择您要如何处理后的图像保存。

phrase.original: Step 3: choose a destination image format
phrase.translation: 第三步：选择目标图像格式。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon needs to know which format to use when saving the images in your batch list.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon需要知道保存图像批处理列表中时使用的格式。

phrase.original: If "keep images in their original format" is selected, PhotoDemon will attempt to save each image in its original format. If the original format is not supported, a standard format (JPEG or PNG, depending on color depth) will be used.
phrase.translation: 如果“保持图像的原始格式”被选中，PhotoDemon将尝试保存每个图像的原始格式。如果不支持原始格式，以标准格式（JPEG或PNG，根据颜色深度）将被使用。

phrase.original: If you choose to save images to a new format, please make sure the format you have selected is appropriate for all images in your list. (For example, images with transparency should be saved to a format that supports transparency!)
phrase.translation: 如果您选择将图像保存到一个新的格式，请确保您所选择的格式适用于列表中的所有图像。 （例如，具有透明性的图像应保存到支持透明度的格式！）

phrase.original: In the final step, you will choose how you want the saved files to be named.
phrase.translation: 在最后一步，选择你想要保存的文件命名方式。

phrase.original: Step 4: provide a destination folder and any renaming options
phrase.translation: 第四步：提供一个目标文件夹和重命名选项。

phrase.original: In this final step, PhotoDemon needs to know where to save the processed images, and what name to give the new files.
phrase.translation: 在这最后一步，PhotoDemon需要知道在哪里保存处理过的图像，以及什么样的名字给新文件。

phrase.original: For your convenience, a number of standard renaming options are also provided. Note that all items under "additional rename options" are optional.
phrase.translation: 为了您的方便，还提供了一些标准的重命名选项。请注意，在“其他选项重命名”的所有项目都是可选的。

phrase.original: Finally, if two or more images in the batch list have the same filename, and the "original filenames" option is selected, such files will automatically be given unique filenames upon saving (e.g. "original-filename (2)").
phrase.translation: 最后，如果该批次列表中两个或更多图像具有相同的文件名，并选择了“原始文件名”选项，这些文件将被自动保存时给出唯一的文件名（例如，“原始文件名（2）”）。

phrase.original: Step 5: wait for batch processing to finish
Once the batch processor has processed several images, it will display an estimated time remaining.
phrase.translation: 一旦批量处理器处理多幅图像，它会显示一个估计的剩余时间。

phrase.original: You can cancel batch processing at any time by pressing the "Cancel" button in the bottom-right corner. If you choose to cancel, any processed images will still be present in the output folder, so you may need to remove them manually.
phrase.translation: 您可以在任何时候按“取消”按钮，在右下角取消批处理。如果您选择取消，任何处理的图像仍然会出现在输出文件夹，所以你可能需要手动删除它们。

phrase.original: Save the current list of images
You haven't selected any image files. Please add one or more files to the batch list before saving.
phrase.translation: 您还没有选择任何图像文件。请在保存前添加一个或多个文件到批处理列表。

phrase.original: if PhotoDemon does not support an image's original format, a standard format will be used
phrase.translation: 如果PhotoDemon不支持的图像的原始格式，一个将用标准格式

phrase.original: ( specifically, JPEG at 92% quality for photographs, and lossless PNG for non-photographs )
phrase.translation: （具体地，JPEG在92％质量为照片，和无损的PNG用于非照片）

phrase.original: processed before cancelation. Last processed image was "%1".
phrase.translation: 取消之前处理。最后处理的图像是 %1

phrase.original: full download path (must begin with "http://" or "ftp://")
phrase.translation: 完整的下载路径（必须以“http：//”或“FTP：//”）

phrase.original: Attempting to connect to the Internet

%1 could not establish an Internet connection. Please double-check your connection. If the problem persists, try downloading the image manually using your Internet browser of choice. Once downloaded, you may open the file in %1 just like any other image file.
phrase.translation: %1 无法建立Internet连接。请仔细检查您的连接。如果问题仍然存在，请手动操作下载图像使用所选的互联网浏览器。下载完成后，你可以打开%1文件就像任何其他的图像文件。

phrase.original: Verifying image URL (this may take a moment)
phrase.translation: 验证图片的网址（这可能需要一些时间）

phrase.original: %1 could not locate a valid file at that URL. Please double-check the path. If the problem persists, try downloading the file manually using your Internet browser.
phrase.translation: %1找不到那个URL的有效文件。请仔细检查路径。如果问题仍然存在，请尝试使用互联网浏览器手动下载文件。
图片网址验证。下载图像

phrase.original: %1 lost access to the Internet. Please double-check your Internet connection. If the problem persists, try downloading the file manually using your Internet browser.
phrase.translation: %1 连接互联网。请仔细检查一下你的网络连接。如果问题仍然存在，请尝试使用您的互联网浏览器手动下载文件。
下载的文件%1的%2字节（收到）
下载完毕。验证文件完整性
取消下载(远程服务器拒绝操作)

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, %1 is preventing %2 from directly downloading this image. (Direct downloads are sometimes mistaken as hotlinking by misconfigured servers.)
You will need to download this file using your Internet browser, then manually load it into %2.
I sincerely apologize for this inconvenience, but unfortunately there is nothing %2 can do about stingy server configurations. :(
phrase.translation:
%1阻止%2直接下载此图片。 （直接下载有时会误认为是盗链接，是由服务器的错误配置造成的。）
您需要手动下载这个文件，然后将其加载到%2。

phrase.original: This URL is not valid. Please make sure the URL begins with "http://" or "ftp://".
phrase.translation: 输入的网址无效，请输入一个正确地址，并以"http://" 或 "ftp://" 开头

phrase.original: Please be respectful of copyrights when downloading images. Even if an image is available online, it may not be licensed for use outside a specific website. Thanks!
phrase.translation: 下载图片时，请尊重版权。即使图像在网上，也可能不被批准用于特定网站外使用。谢谢！

phrase.original: Load each page as its own image
phrase.translation: 加载每一页作为自己的图像

phrase.original: always apply this action to multi-image files
phrase.translation: 始终把这个动作应用于多图像文件

phrase.original: %1 contains multiple pages (%2 in total). How would you like to proceed?
phrase.translation: %1包含多个页面（%2个）。你认为该怎样继续？

phrase.original: %1 is an animated GIF file (%2 frames total). How would you like to proceed?
phrase.translation: %1是一个GIF动画文件（%2帧）。你认为该怎样继续？

phrase.original: Load each frame as a separate image
phrase.translation: 加载每个帧作为一个单独的图像

phrase.original: This option will load every frame in the animated GIF file as an individual image.
phrase.translation: 此选项将加载在动画GIF文件的每个帧作为一个单独的图象。

phrase.original: This option will only load a single frame from the animated GIF file, effectively treating at as a non-animated GIF file.
phrase.translation: 此选项将只从动画GIF文件加载一个单一的框架，有效地处理在非动画GIF文件。

phrase.original: %1 contains multiple icons (%2 in total). How would you like to proceed?
phrase.translation: %1包含多个图标（%2个）。你认为该怎样继续？

phrase.original: Load each icon as a separate image
phrase.translation: 加载每个图标为一个单独的图像

phrase.original: This option will load every icon in the ICO file as an individual image.
phrase.translation: 此选项将加载每个图标ICO文件作为一个单独的图像。

phrase.original: This option will only load a single icon from the ICO file.
phrase.translation: 此选项将只加载从ICO文件中的一个图标。

phrase.original: Load each page as a separate image
phrase.translation: 加载每个页面作为单独的图像

phrase.original: This option will load every page in the TIFF file as an individual image.
phrase.translation: 此选项将加载TIFF文件的每一页作为单独的图像。

phrase.original: This option will only load a single page from the TIFF file.
phrase.translation: 此选项将只从TIFF文件中加载一个页面。

phrase.original: currently available programs (listed by window title)
phrase.translation: 目前可用的程序（按窗口标题列出）

phrase.original: Please select a window to capture.
This program is currently minimized. Restore it to normal size for best results.
phrase.translation: 这个程序是目前最小化。将其还原为正常大小以获得最佳结果。

phrase.original: Some programs (including Windows Store apps) do not allow direct screen captures. If an application preview appears as a black square, you will need to take a full desktop screenshot, then manually crop the desired window region.
phrase.translation: 有些程序（包括 Windows 应用商店程序）不允许直接屏幕捕获，如果一个应用程序预览显示为黑色，请您需要截取一个完整的桌面截图，然后手动裁剪所需的窗口区域。

phrase.original: one image spread across multiple pages (poster print)
phrase.translation: 一张图片传播多页（海报打印）

phrase.original: In the next step, you can specify detailed layout information (margins, positioning, etc)
phrase.translation: 在下一步中，您可以指定详细的布局信息（边缘、定位等）
步骤2之1：基本的打印设置

phrase.original: note: DPI is read-only when "fit to page" is selected.
phrase.translation: 注意：DPI是只读的，当“适合页”被选中。

phrase.original: Print previewing requires the FreeImage plugin, which could not be located on this computer. To enable previewing, please go to Edit -> Preferences and select "check for missing plugins on program start." The next time you load PhotoDemon, it will offer to download this plugin for you.
phrase.translation: 打印预览需要FreeImage的插件，它无法找到这台计算机上。要启用预览，请去编辑 - “检查在程序启动缺少插件”>首选项，然后选择下一次当你加载PhotoDemon，它会提供下载这个插件为您服务。

phrase.original: %1 was unable to print the image. Please make sure that the specified printer (%2) is powered-on and ready for printing.
phrase.translation: % 1 无法打印图像。请确保指定的打印机（% 2）已准备就绪。

phrase.original: Image printed successfully. (Note: depending on your printer, additional print confirmation screens may appear.)
phrase.translation: 图像打印成功。 （注意：根据您的打印机，附加的打印确认屏幕可能会出现。）

phrase.original: Waiting for user to specify export options
phrase.translation: 等待用户指定导出选项
透明颜色（右键选择图像）

phrase.original: Super compression, very poor image quality (256:1)
phrase.translation: 超级压缩，图像质量非常差（256:1）
适度压缩，中等图像质量（60）

phrase.original: Super compression, very poor image quality (20)
change file extension to match color model
phrase.translation: 改变文件扩展名来匹配颜色模型

phrase.original: click to generate a new preview image
phrase.translation: 单击以生成新的预览图像

phrase.original: please wait while a new preview image is created
phrase.translation: 请稍候正在创建一个新的预览图像

phrase.original: These lossy optimization settings reduced file size by %1.
phrase.translation: 这些有损优化设置减少了 %1 的文件大小。

phrase.original: the fast, free, portable photo editor
phrase.translation: 快速，免费的，便携式照片编辑器

phrase.original: Participate in development, design, or translation work
phrase.translation: 参与开发、设计或翻译工作
审查程序和插件许可证

phrase.original: PhotoDemon is Copyright %1 2001-2017 by Tanner Helland and Contributors
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon Copyright %1 2001-2017 版权属于 Tanner Helland 和贡献者

phrase.original: Note: this operation will flatten the image before resizing it.
phrase.translation: 注意：调整它在此之前操作将拼合图像。
初始化内容识别调整引擎
生成完整的元数据报告（HTML）

phrase.original: Remove tags that might contain personal information
phrase.translation: 删除可能包含个人信息的标签

phrase.original: Reset tag to its original value
Mark this entire group for removal
Reset entire group to its original values
phrase.translation: 重置整个组为其原始值

phrase.original: Metadata support is provided by the open-source ExifTool library.
phrase.translation: 元数据支持由开源ExifTool库提供。

phrase.original: "System" tags are provided by the operating system. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: “系统”标签由操作系统提供。它们不被嵌入传统元数据。

phrase.original: "File" tags are required by this image format. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: “文件”标签是由该图像格式要求。它们不嵌入作为传统的元数据。

phrase.original: ICC profiles are handled automatically by PhotoDemon. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: ICC配置文件是由PhotoDemon自动处理。它们不嵌入作为传统的元数据。

phrase.original: "Inferred" tags are hypothetical values inferred from other metadata. They are not embedded as traditional metadata.
phrase.translation: “推断”标签是从其他元数据中推断出来的假设值。它们不被嵌入传统元数据。

phrase.original: This is a protected tag. Edits are allowed, but they may be overwritten to produce a valid image file.
phrase.translation: 这是一个受保护标签。虽然允许编辑，但他们可能会被覆盖以产生一个有效的图像文件。

phrase.original: This tag is restricted. It cannot be edited, and removal requests will be ignored if they result in an invalid file.
phrase.translation: 这个标签被限制。它不能被编辑，如果它们导致无效的文件，则将被忽略。

phrase.original: list of %1, one entry per line
Click to change the color used for empty borders
phrase.translation: 单击更改用于空边框的颜色

phrase.original: when changing aspect ratio, fit image to new size by
phrase.translation: 改变长宽比时，适应新的图像大小
双三次（米切尔和奈特拉瓦利）

phrase.original: fitting inclusively, with transparent borders as necessary
fitting exclusively, and cropping as necessary
phrase.translation: 完全拟合，根据需要裁剪

phrase.original: Resampling affects the quality of a resized image. For a good summary of resampling techniques, visit the Image Resampling article on Wikipedia.
phrase.translation: 重采样的大小对图像质量的影响，请参考相关资料获取更多信息。

phrase.original: By default, descriptive names are used in place of technical ones. Advanced users can toggle this option to expose more resampling techniques.
phrase.translation: 默认情况下，使用描述性名称。高级用户可以使用选项选择更多的重采样技术。

phrase.original: When changing an image's aspect ratio, undesirable stretching may occur. PhotoDemon can avoid this by using empty borders or cropping instead.
phrase.translation: 改变图像的纵横比时，可能发生拉伸变形。系统会可以用空边界或交叉代替来解决这个问题。

phrase.original: make the new layer the active layer
color to erase (right-click preview to select)
phrase.translation: 颜色擦除（右键单击预览选择）

phrase.original: Adding new alpha channel to image
Add a blank layer to the image.
phrase.translation: 为当前图像添加一个新的空白层

phrase.original: Move the current layer upward in the layer stack.
phrase.translation: 向上移动当前选择的层

phrase.original: Move the current layer downward in the layer stack.
File tools: create, load, and save image files
phrase.translation: 文件工具：创建、加载和保存图像文件

phrase.original: Undo/Redo tools: revert destructive changes made to an image or layer
phrase.translation: 撤消/重做工具：恢复对图像或图层的破坏性变化

phrase.original: Non-destructive tools: move, rotate, or apply certain photo adjustments without permanently modifying an image
phrase.translation: 非破坏性的工具：移动，旋转，或适用于某些照片调整，而无需永久修改图像

phrase.original: Select tools: isolate parts of an image or layer for further editing
phrase.translation: 选择工具：将图像或图层中的部分隔离，以进行进一步的编辑

phrase.original: Text tools: create and edit text layers
phrase.translation: 文本工具：创建和编辑文本图层

phrase.original: Paint tools: use a mouse, touchpad, or pen tablet to apply brushstrokes to an image or layer
phrase.translation: 画图工具：使用鼠标，触摸板，或手写板来操作图像或层

phrase.original: This option will create a blank image. Other ways to create new images can be found in the File -> Import menu.
phrase.translation: 创建一个空白图像（快捷键：Ctrl+N）。

phrase.original: Another way to open images is dragging them from your desktop or Windows Explorer and dropping them onto PhotoDemon.
phrase.translation: 打开的图像一个要编辑的图像(快捷键：Ctrl+O)。

phrase.original: Open one or more images for editing
phrase.translation: 打开一个或多个图像进行编辑

phrase.original: If the current image has not been saved, you will receive a prompt to save it before it closes.
phrase.translation: 如果当前图像没有被保存，您将收到一个提示来保存它在它关闭之前。

phrase.original: Because you have turned off save prompts (via Edit -> Preferences), you WILL NOT receive a prompt to save this image before it closes.
phrase.translation: 因为你已经关闭保存提示（通过工具 - >选项），您将不会收到一个提示关闭之前保存此图像。

phrase.original: WARNING: this will overwrite the current image file. To save to a different file, use the "Save As" button.
phrase.translation: 警告：这会覆盖当前的图像文件。要保存到不同的文件，使用“另存为”按钮。

phrase.original: You have specified "safe" save mode, which means that each save will create a new file with an auto-incremented filename.
phrase.translation: 您指定的“安全”的保存方式，这意味着每个省将创建一个新文件，文件名自动递增。

phrase.original: Use this to quickly save a lossless copy of the current image. The lossless copy will be saved in PDI format, in the image's current folder, using the current filename (plus an auto-incremented number, as necessary).
phrase.translation: 使用该快速保存当前图像的无损复制。无损复制将保存在PDI的格式，在图像的当前文件夹，使用当前文件名（加上一个自动增加的数量，如有）。

phrase.original: The Save As command always raises a dialog, so you can specify a new file name, folder, and/or image format for the current image.
phrase.translation: 保存为“命令”总是引发一个对话框，所以您可以指定当前图像的新文件名、文件夹和/或图像格式。

phrase.original: Save As (export to new format or filename)
phrase.translation: 保存为（导出到新的格式或文件名）
手（点击并拖动图像滚动）
锁定移动,调整光线和色温

phrase.original: Fills support many different styles. Click to switch between solid color, pattern, and gradient styles.
Tolerance controls how similar two pixels must be before spreading the fill between them.
Normally, fill operations analyze the entire image. You can also analyze just the active layer.
Normally, fills spread out from a target pixel, adding neighboring pixels as it goes. You can alternatively set it to analyze the entire image, without regard for continuity.
This option controls how pixels are analyzed when adding them to the fill.

phrase.translation: 自动激活鼠标下方的层

phrase.original: ignore transparent pixels when auto-activating layers
phrase.translation: 透明像素时忽略自动激活层

phrase.original: Make current layer transforms (size, angle, and shear) permanent. This action is never required, but if viewport rendering is sluggish, it may improve performance.
phrase.translation: 使当前图层变换（大小，角度和剪切）永久性的。这个动作是从来没有必需的，但如果视渲染是呆滞，它可以提高性能。
重置所有快速修复调整值

phrase.original: Make quick-fix adjustments permanent. This action is never required, but if viewport rendering is sluggish and many quick-fix adjustments are active, it may improve performance.
phrase.translation: 快速调整。这个操作不是必需的，但如果视觉渲染慢，使用此操作可以提高性能。

phrase.original: Click to change the way selections are rendered onto the image canvas. This has no bearing on selection contents - only the way they appear while editing.
phrase.translation: 单击更改选择呈现到画布的方式。这无关选择的内容只有他们的方式出现在编辑。

phrase.original: This option controls how smoothly a selection blends with its surroundings.
phrase.translation: 该选项控制选择与周围环境如何顺畅混合。

phrase.original: These options control the area affected by a selection. The selection can be modified on-canvas while any of these settings are active. For more advanced selection adjustments, use the Select menu.
phrase.translation: 这些选项控制受选择的区域。选择可以修改的画布上，而所有的这些设置是活动的。对于更高级的选择进行调整，使用选择菜单。

phrase.original: This option adjusts the width of the selection border.
phrase.translation: 此选项调整选区边框的宽度。

phrase.original: This feathering slider allows for immediate feathering adjustments. For performance reasons, it is limited to small radii. For larger feathering radii, please use the Select -> Feathering menu.
phrase.translation: 此羽化滑块就可以立即羽化调整。由于性能的原因，它被限制为小半径。对于较大的羽化半径，请使用选择 - >羽化菜单。

phrase.original: This option adjusts the roundness of a rectangular selection's corners.
phrase.translation: 此选项调整的一个矩形选区的边角的圆度。

phrase.original: This option adjusts the width of a line selection.
This option adjusts the curvature, if any, of a polygon selection's sides.
phrase.translation: 此选项调整曲率的多边形选择的边，如果有的话。

phrase.original: This option increases the smoothness of a hand-drawn lasso selection.
phrase.translation: 这个选项增加了一个手绘套索选择的平滑度。

phrase.original: Tolerance controls how similar two pixels must be before adding them to a magic wand selection.
phrase.translation: 公差控制在将它们添加到一个魔术棒的选择之前，必须将其相似的像素点控制。

phrase.original: The magic wand can operate on the entire image, or just the active layer.
phrase.translation: 魔法棒可以在整个图像上操作，或者仅仅是在活动层上。

phrase.original: Normally, the magic wand will spread out from the target pixel, adding neighboring pixels to the selection as it goes. You can alternatively set it to search the entire image, without regards for continuity.
phrase.translation: 通常，魔术棒会从目标像素中扩散，在选择的情况下增加相邻像素。可以把它设置为搜索整个图像，而不考虑连续性。

phrase.original: This option controls which criteria the magic wand uses to determine whether a pixel should be added to the current selection.
phrase.translation: 此选项控制了魔术棒使用的标准，以确定是否应该将像素添加到当前选择。

phrase.original: This layer is a typography layer. To edit it with the basic text tool, you must first convert it to a basic text layer.
phrase.translation: 这层是排版层。要使用基本的文本编辑工具，则必须先将其转换为一个基本的文本层。

phrase.original: Click here to convert this layer to a basic text layer.
phrase.translation: 点击此处这层转换为基本的文本层。

phrase.original: This layer is a basic text layer. To edit it with the typography tool, you must first convert it to a typography layer.
phrase.translation: 这个层是基本文本层，要用排版字体来编辑它，你必须先把它转换为一个排版层。

phrase.original: Click here to convert this layer to a typography layer.
phrase.translation: 单击此处可将此图层转换为排版层。
第一步：选择一个语言文件

phrase.original: start a new language file from scratch
phrase.translation: 建立一个新的语言文件
编辑已经存在的语言文件

phrase.original: e.g. "complete", "unfinished", etc. Any descriptive text is acceptable.
phrase.translation: 例如“完成”，“未完成”等任何说明性的文字。

phrase.original: e.g. "English" or "English (US)". This text will be displayed in PhotoDemon's Language menu.
phrase.translation: 例如“英语”或“英语（美国）”。该文本将显示在PhotoDemon的语言菜单。

phrase.original: e.g. "US" for "United States". Please use the official 2-character ISO 3166-1 format.
phrase.translation: 例如“美国”为“US”。请使用官方的2个字符的ISO3166-1格式。

phrase.original: e.g. "en" for "English". Please use the official 2-character ISO 639-1 format.
phrase.translation: 例如为“英语”“EN”。请使用官方的2个字符的ISO639-1格式。

phrase.original: Save this translation and proceed to the next phrase
phrase.translation: 保存并继续翻译下一句

phrase.original: automatically estimate missing translations (via Google Translate)
phrase.translation: 自动翻译（通过谷歌翻译）

phrase.original: ENTER key automatically saves and proceeds to next phrase
phrase.translation: 回车键自动保存并继续翻译下一句

phrase.original: Initiate auto-translation of all missing phrases
phrase.translation: 启动自动翻译的所有缺失词组

phrase.original: This action can take a very long time to complete. Once started, it cannot be canceled. Are you sure you want to continue?
phrase.translation: 这个操作可能花很长的时间来完成。一旦开始，就不能取消。你确定要继续吗？

phrase.original: Automatic translations were interrupted (the translation object stopped responding). The existing work has been auto-saved.
phrase.translation: 自动翻译被中断（翻译对象停止响应）。现有的工作已自动保存。

phrase.original:
Are you sure you want to delete %1?
(Even though this is an official PhotoDemon language file, you can safely delete it.)
phrase.translation: 确实要删除 %1？ （这是官方photodemon语言文件，您可以安全地删除它。）

phrase.original: You do not have access to this folder. Please log in as an administrator and try again.
phrase.translation: 您没有访问此文件夹权限。请以管理员身份登录并再次尝试。

phrase.original:
Are you sure you want to delete %1?
(Unless you have manually backed up this language file, this action cannot be undone.)
phrase.translation: 确实要删除 %1？ （除非你有手动备份这个语言文件，此操作无法撤消。）

phrase.original: Please select a language before continuing to the next step.
phrase.translation: 请选择一种语言继续下一步。

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, the master language file could not be located on this PC. This file is included with the official release of PhotoDemon, but it may not be included with development or beta builds.
To start a new translation, please download a fresh copy of PhotoDemon from photodemon.org.
phrase.translation:
主语言文件没有找到，此文件包含在PhotoDemon的正式版本中，但它可能不会被包括在开发或测试版本。
要开始一个新的翻译，请从PhotoDemon.org下载PhotoDemon的新副本。

phrase.original:
Unfortunately, this language file could not be loaded. It's possible the copy on this PC is out-of-date.
To continue, please download a fresh copy of PhotoDemon from photodemon.org.
phrase.translation:
这种语言文件无法加载。这有可能在这台电脑上拷贝已经过期。
要继续，请从PhotoDemon.org下载PhotoDemon的新副本。

phrase.original: Language file could not be loaded
This tool allows you to create and edit PhotoDemon language files.
phrase.translation: 此工具可以建立或编辑一个语言文件。

phrase.original: Please start by selecting a base language file. If the selected file already contains translation data, you will be able to edit any existing translations, as well as add translations that may be missing.
phrase.translation: 请选择一个要开始编辑或翻译的语言文件。如果所选文件已经包含了翻译数据，你就可以编辑任何现有的翻译，以及添加新的翻译。

phrase.original: This page also allows you to delete unused language files. Note that there is no Undo when deleting language files, so please be careful!
phrase.translation: 该页面还允许您删除未使用的语言文件。请注意，删除的语言文件的时候不能撤销，所以请一定要小心！

phrase.original: Upon clicking Next, the selected file will automatically be validated and parsed. Depending on the number of translations present, this process may take a few seconds.
phrase.translation: 当点击下一步，选择的文件将自动进行验证和分析。根据目前的翻译的数量，这个过程可能需要几秒钟或更多时间。

phrase.original: (For best results, do not use this editor in the IDE!)
phrase.translation: （为了获得最佳效果，请不要使用此编辑器在VB IDE中！）

phrase.original: In this step, please provide a bit of metadata regarding this language. This information helps PhotoDemon know how to handle this language file.
phrase.translation: 在这一步，请提供有关该语言的元数据。这些信息有助于PhotoDemon知道如何处理这种语言文件。

phrase.original: The most important items on this page are the language ID and language name. If these items are missing or invalid, PhotoDemon won't be able to use the language file.
phrase.translation: 此页面上的最重要的项目是语言ID和语言名称。如果这些项目缺失或无效，PhotoDemon将不能够使用这个语言文件。

phrase.original: If multiple translators have worked on this language file, please separate their names with commas. If this language file is based on an existing language file, please include the original author's name.
phrase.translation: 如果有多个翻译人员对这个语言文件工作过，请用逗号分开他们的名字。如果这个语言文件是基于一个现有的语言文件时，请注明原作者的姓名。

phrase.original: (NOTE: changes made to this page won't be auto-saved unless you click the Next or Previous button.)
phrase.translation: （注：此页面所做的更改将不会被自动保存，除非你点击下一步或上一个按钮。）

phrase.original: This final step allows you to edit existing translations, and add missing ones.
phrase.translation: 这是最后一步，可以编辑现有的翻译，并添加未翻译的内容。

phrase.original: Every time a phrase is modified, an autosave will automatically be created in PhotoDemon's user language folder. This means you can exit the program at any time without losing your work.
phrase.translation: 每翻译一个语句后系统会自动保存，以保证随时退出而不会丢失。

phrase.original: When you are done translating, you may use the Save and Exit button to save your work to a file of your choosing. (Note that autosave data will be preserved either way.)
phrase.translation: 当你完成翻译后，你可以使用保存退出按钮以保存您的工作。

phrase.original: When you are finished editing this language, please consider sharing it! Contact me by visiting
phrase.translation: 当您完成编辑这一语言，请与我联系、分享它！

phrase.original: so we can discuss adding your translation to the official list of supported languages. Even partial translations are helpful!
phrase.translation: 我们可以考虑加入你的语言翻译文件到正式语言列表中。

phrase.original: Please wait while the language file is validated
phrase.translation: 请稍候，正在验证语言文件

phrase.original: Validation successful! Loading all phrases and preparing translation engine
phrase.translation: 验证成功！正在加载所有的短语和预备的翻译引擎（可能需要几分钟，请稍候）
最近使用的文件快捷方式

phrase.original: maximum number of recent file entries
phrase.translation: 最近文件项的最大数目

phrase.original: use the current system profiles for each display
phrase.translation: 使用每个显示器的当前系统配置文件

phrase.original: use custom profiles for each display
phrase.translation: 为每个显示使用自定义配置文件

phrase.original: when closing images, warn me me about unsaved changes
phrase.translation: 关闭图像时，提醒我保存修改后的图像

phrase.original: when using the "Save As" command, set the default file format according to
phrase.translation: 当使用“另存为”命令时，使用设定的默认文件格式

phrase.original: save behavior: overwrite vs make a copy
phrase.translation: 保存操作：覆盖/建立副本
保存时使用默认文件格式

phrase.original: list PhotoDemon as the last-used editing software
phrase.translation: 将PhotoDemon作为最后使用的编辑软件

phrase.original: display tone mapping options when importing HDR and RAW images
phrase.translation: 当导入HDR和原图像时显示色调映射选项

phrase.original: obey auto-rotate instructions inside image files
phrase.translation: 遵循图像文件内的自动旋转指令

phrase.original: when an image is first loaded, set its viewport zoom to
phrase.translation: 当一个图像第一次打开，将自动缩放到窗口

phrase.original: forcibly extract binary-type tags as Base64 (slow)
phrase.translation: 强行提取二进制类型标记为Base64（慢）

phrase.original: compress undo/redo data at the following level
phrase.translation: 压缩撤销/在以下级别重做数据

phrase.original: when generating image and layer thumbnail images
phrase.translation: 生成的图像和图层缩略图时，

phrase.original: memory usage will be displayed here
phrase.translation: 内存的使用将会显示在这里

phrase.original: notify me when an update is ready

phrase.translation: 请选择一个颜色配置文件

phrase.original:
All settings will be restored to their default values. This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to continue?
phrase.translation: 所有设置都将恢复到默认值。此动作无法撤消。 您确定要继续吗？

phrase.original: descriptive - full image locations, including folder(s)
phrase.translation: 描述--完整图像位置，包括文件夹

phrase.original: The title bar of the main PhotoDemon window displays information about the currently loaded image. Use this preference to control how much information is displayed.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon主窗口的标题栏显示有关当前加载的图像的信息， 使用此首选项可以控制显示的信息量。

phrase.original: The "Recent Files" menu width is limited by Windows. To prevent this menu from overflowing, PhotoDemon can display image names only instead of full image locations.
phrase.translation: 在“最近的文件”菜单的宽度是由Windows的限制。为了防止溢出这个菜单，PhotoDemon可以显示图像名称改为只完整图像位置。

phrase.original: If an image has transparent areas, a checkerboard is typically displayed "behind" the image. This box lets you change the checkerboard's colors.
phrase.translation: 如果图像有透明区域，棋盘上通常显示“后面”的形象。此对话框允许您更改棋盘的颜色。

phrase.original: Click to change the first checkerboard background color for alpha channels
phrase.translation: 单击更改第一个棋盘背景色alpha通道

phrase.original: Click to change the second checkerboard background color for alpha channels
phrase.translation: 点击更改第二个棋盘背景色alpha通道

phrase.original: If an image has transparent areas, a checkerboard is typically displayed "behind" the image. This box lets you change the checkerboard's size.
phrase.translation: 如果图像有透明区域，棋盘上通常显示“后面”的形象。此对话框允许您更改棋盘格的大小。

phrase.original: feature disabled due to missing plugin
phrase.translation: 由于缺少插件功能被禁用

phrase.original: HDR and RAW images contain more colors than PC screens can physically display. Before displaying such images, a tone mapping operation must be applied to the original image data.
phrase.translation: HDR和原图像包含比PC屏幕可以显示更多的颜色。在显示这些图像之前，必须将图像映射操作应用于原始图像数据。

phrase.original: Most digital photos include rotation instructions (EXIF orientation metadata), which PhotoDemon will use to automatically rotate photos. Some older smartphones and cameras may not write these instructions correctly, so if your photos are being imported sideways or upside-down, you can try disabling the auto-rotate feature.
phrase.translation: 大部分的数码照片包括旋转指令（EXIF方向的元数据），PhotoDemon将使用自动旋转照片。一些老的智能手机和相机可能不写这些说明正确的，所以如果你的照片被导入横盘或倒置，您可以尝试禁用自动旋转功能。
自动适应屏幕上的图像

phrase.original: Any photo larger than 2 megapixels is too big to fit on an average computer monitor. PhotoDemon can automatically zoom out on large photographs so that the entire image is viewable.
phrase.translation: 任何照片超过2百万像素太大的图像，放在普通的电脑显示器将不适合，PhotoDemon可以自动缩小大照片让整个图像是可见的。

phrase.original: the current file format of the image being saved
phrase.translation: 保存图像的当前文件格式

phrase.original: the last image format I used in the "Save As" screen
phrase.translation: “保存为”屏幕的最后一个图像格式

phrase.original: Most photo editors use the format of the current image as the default in the "Save As" screen. When working with RAW images that will eventually be saved to JPEG, it is useful to have PhotoDemon remember that - hence the "last used" option.
phrase.translation: 大部分照片编辑器使用当前图像的格式作为默认的“另存为”窗口。当最终将被保存为JPEG格式的RAW图像的工作，它是有PhotoDemon记住有用的 - 因此，“上一次使用”选项。
改写当前文件（默认操作）

phrase.original: save a new copy, e.g. "filename (2).jpg" (safe behavior)
phrase.translation: 保存一个新的副本，如“文件名（2）.JPG”（安全）

phrase.original: In most photo editors, the "Save" command saves the image over its original version, erasing that copy forever. PhotoDemon provides a "safer" option, where each save results in a new copy of the file.
phrase.translation: 在大多数照片编辑器中，“保存”命令将图像保存在它的原始版本中，这样就可以将它复制到永远。PhotoDemon提供一个“安全”选项，其中每个结果保存在该文件的新副本。

phrase.original: Some interface elements receive custom decorations (like drop shadows). On older PCs, these decorations can be suspended for a small performance boost.
phrase.translation: 一些界面元素接收自定义的装饰（如阴影）。在较旧的电脑上，这些装饰物可用于小的性能提升。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon has to generate a lot of thumbnail images, especially when images contain multiple layers. The quality of these thumbnails can be lowered in order to improve performance.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon已经产生了很多的缩略图图像，特别是当图像包含多个层。这些缩略图的质量可以降低以提高性能。

phrase.original: Rendering the primary image canvas is a common bottleneck for PhotoDemon's performance. The automatic setting is recommended, but for older PCs, you can manually select the Maximize Performance option to sacrifice quality for raw performance.
phrase.translation: 绘制主要意象油画是PhotoDemon的表现一个共同的瓶颈。自动设置建议，但旧电脑，你可以手动选择最大限度地牺牲质量为原料的性能选项。

phrase.original: By default, PhotoDemon's undo data is not compressed. This makes undo operations very fast, but increases disk space usage. Compressing undo data will reduce disk space usage, at some cost to performance. (Note that undo data is erased when PhotoDemon exits, so this setting only affects disk space usage while PhotoDemon is running.)
phrase.translation: 默认情况下，PhotoDemon的撤销数据未被压缩。这使得撤消操作速度很快，但增加磁盘空间的使用。压缩的撤销数据将减少磁盘空间的使用，存在一定的成本性能。（注意：撤销数据被删除时，PhotoDemon退出，所以这个设置只影响PhotoDemon运行时磁盘空间的使用。）

phrase.original: Turning off display color management can provide a small performance boost. If your display is not currently configured for color management, use this setting.
phrase.translation: 关闭显示器颜色管理可以稍微提升性能， 如果您的显示器当前未配置颜色管理，请使用此设置。

phrase.original: This setting is the best choice for most users. If you have no idea what color management is, use this setting. If you have correctly configured a display profile via the Windows Control Panel, also use this setting.
phrase.translation: 此设置适用于大多数用户的最佳选择。如果你不知道什么是色彩管理，使用此设置。如果您已经正确通过Windows控制面板配置显示配置文件，也可以使用此设置。

phrase.original: To configure custom color profiles on a per-monitor basis, please use this setting.
phrase.translation: 要在每个显示器的基础配置自定义颜色配置文件，请使用此设置。

phrase.original: Please specify a color profile for each monitor currently attached to the system. Note that the text in parentheses is the display adapter driving the named monitor.
phrase.translation: 请指定当前连接到系统的每个显示器颜色配置文件。注意，括号中的文字是显示适配器驱动名为显示器。

phrase.original: Click this button to bring up a "browse for color profile" dialog.
phrase.translation: 点击该按钮，弹出一个“浏览颜色配置文件”对话框。

phrase.original: If you do not know what this setting controls, set it to "Perceptual". Perceptual rendering intent is the best choice for most users.
phrase.translation: 如果您不知道此设置的控制方式，请将其设置为“感知”。 感知渲染是大多数用户的最佳选择。

phrase.original: Because PhotoDemon is a portable application, it can only check for updates when the program is running. By default, PhotoDemon will check for updates whenever the program is launched, but you can reduce this frequency if desired.
phrase.translation: 因为PhotoDemon是一种便携式的应用程序，它只在程序运行时检查更新。默认情况下，PhotoDemon将检查每当程序启动更新，但如果需要的话你可以降低这种频率。

phrase.original: One of the best ways to support PhotoDemon is to help test new releases. By default, PhotoDemon will suggest both stable and beta releases, but the truly adventurous can also try developer releases. (Developer releases give you immediate access to the latest program enhancements, but you might encounter some bugs.)
phrase.translation: 其中一个支持PhotoDemon的最佳方法是帮助测试新版本。默认情况下，PhotoDemon会建议稳定和beta版，但真正的冒险也可以尝试开发者版本。 （开发版本让您立即获得最新的程序改进，但你可能会遇到一些错误。）

phrase.original: PhotoDemon's volunteer translators regularly update the program's language files. PhotoDemon can automatically download these updates separate from the main program, ensuring that you always have the most up-to-date language files.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon的志愿者定期更新程序的语言文件。PhotoDemon可以自动下载这些更新主程序，确保您始终获得最新的语言文件。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon uses some 3rd-party plugins. Sometimes, the authors of these plugins fix bugs or add new features. Instead of waiting for the next PhotoDemon release, you can receive plugin updates as soon as they become available.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon使用一些第三方插件。有时，这些插件的作者修复错误或添加新的功能。而不是等待下一次PhotoDemon版本，您可以尽快为他们变得可用插件收到更新。

phrase.original: PhotoDemon can notify you when it's ready to apply an update. This allows you to use the updated version immediately.
phrase.translation: PhotoDemon可以通知您，当它已经准备好应用更新。这使您可以立即使用更新的版本。

phrase.original:
The developers of PhotoDemon take privacy very seriously, so no information - statistical or otherwise - is uploaded during the update process. Updates simply involve downloading several small XML files from photodemon.org. These files contain the latest software, plugin, and language version numbers. If updated versions are found, and user preferences allow, the updated files are then downloaded and patched automatically.
If you still choose to disable updates, don't forget to visit photodemon.org from time to time to check for new versions.
phrase.translation: 开发商PhotoDemon很重视隐私，所以更新过程不会上传个人信息或其他类似内容。更新只涉及从PhotoDemon.org下载几个小的XML文件。这些文件包含最新的软件，插件和语言的版本号。如果发现有更新的版本，并且发现有用户选项设置中允许更新的文件，软件会下载并自动更新。 如果你选择禁用更新，别忘了随时访问PhotoDemon.org检查是否有新版本。

phrase.original: max PhotoDemon memory usage this session
phrase.translation: 本次会话PhotoDemon使用最大内存

phrase.original: WARNING: this folder is invalid (access prohibited). Please provide a valid folder. If a new folder is not provided, PhotoDemon will use the system temp folder.
phrase.translation: 警告：这个文件夹无效（禁止访问）。请提供一个有效的文件夹。如果没有提供一个新的有效文件夹，PhotoDemon将使用系统临时文件夹。

phrase.original: This new temporary folder location will not take effect until you restart the program.
phrase.translation: 新的临时文件夹的位置将在重新启动程序后生效。

phrase.original: installed, enabled, and up to date
